name: Jumping!
description:
Player QQ Group: 562345294

Are you looking for a simple jumping game?
Are you confused by the gimmicky game interface?
Now you can play Jumping!
Gameplay
You just need to press the button to control the genie to jump over the gap! Don't let it fall!
Complete the game's levels with a few jumps!

Game Mechanics
And don't touch platforms of specific colors at the same time! That's one of the ways you can fail!

* Dodge gaps! Don't let your controlled sprites fall!
* Make sure there's a foothold! Don't fall on blocks of different colors!
* Requires the player's agile reflexes! Hurry up and challenge!
* Easy to control! Just remember two keystrokes!
* Pixel style meets your love of minimalist style!
What are you thinking about, does it take your hesitation to play such a game that can be played by cats in the house? Of course not!
